TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: Triggered when users call the withdrawReward function.
TransactionStateContext.BonusClaimState: Executed when users attempt to claim their first withdrawal bonus by calling getFirstWithdrawalBonus.

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfer: Tokens are transferred between the contract and user addresses when withdrawReward is called.
ExternalInteractions.ReentrancyRisk: Calling withdrawReward from within getFirstWithdrawalBonus opens the contract to reentrancy vulnerabilities.
